# e-tag



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                           | Type               | Default        |
| ---------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ | -------------- |
| `desc`     | `desc`      | * desc is the description of the tag                  | `string`           | `undefined`    |
| `image`    | `image`     |                                                       | `string`           | `"cancel.svg"` |
| `imageUrl` | `image-url` | * imageUrl is the url to the Image for the tag opened | `string`           | `undefined`    |
| `price`    | `price`     | * price is the price of the product in the tag        | `number \| string` | `undefined`    |
| `xPos`     | `x-pos`     | * xPos is the coordinate of Horizontal Axis           | `number \| string` | `undefined`    |
| `yPos`     | `y-pos`     | * yPos is the coordinate of Vertical Axis             | `number \| string` | `undefined`    |
